oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Crescent Drive in showing of the Misfits and Seven Ways from Sunday
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Motion picture theaters; Film posters; Motion Pictures; ; Monroe, Marilyn, 1926-1962; Gable, Clark; Murphy, Audie, 1924-1971
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and blue on white) announcing three film times: "The Misfits" starring Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe on March 19-22, "Seven Ways from Sundown" in color starring Audie Murphy on March 23-24, and Double Feature of "I'm all Right Jack" and "Man on a String" on March 25.
